Sasuke zurra a Sakura, pero Kakashi llega antes de que la mate (si es que la iba a matar, siempre quedara esa duda) y Kakashi obviamente ownea a un Sasuke que ahora mismo esta para el arrastre... Spoiler
Naruto 445: Nagatos second pain
Verification: Pending
Source: Naruto Central

Konoha shinobi get killed by a massive shinra tensai but he hates the entire leaf for bringing out such shinobi.
Naruto 445 Raw | Naruto 445 Spoiler
Nagato concludes with the words yelled in rage and with tears: Thats my first painfull experience who shaped me, my parents who just were civilians defending their family cold bloody killed by Konoha shinobis.

The sad looking and speaking Naruto comments on this. I understand though I never had any parents and were hated by the whole village for the Kyuubi sealed in me
Naruto 445 Chapter | Naruto 445 Spoiler
Then he gets interupted by the screaming Nagato. HOW!!! can you dare to say you understand me with not even knowing what it means to loose his parents.

In the next panel the still calm and slightly whining Naruto speaks on. Youre right, I not truly can understand you but..

A panel with the interested expression of Nagato comes.
Naruto 445 Manga | Naruto chapter 445
but my best friend, the first person I could call my friend ever and whom I even consider as sort of a brother He got his entire clan killed by his big brother and he also knows the black hell of loneliness as me

Nagato interupts again. So what will you tell me now?

he only thought about revenge like you did but during the time we where Team 7 he forget about his pain and longing for revenge, he realized what you failed to see. He accepted the past and overcome his pain and we had much fun together

You know what, I all alone as I was with killed parents and an even if I didnt liked her much, abducted from unknown ninjas big sister also forget the pain after I met Konan and my best friend Yahiko, at least for a while Nagato said in a strange way with mixed emotions.

Next panel the now surprised Naruto asked. Then how did you become like this?

Now Nagoto continues with a painfull voice. Here I will tell you about my second big pain who made me realize what reality is. This was years after we met Jiraya but listen to the story from the begining.

After the event with the murdering of my parents I cried for a few days until all the food remaining was eaten. I was forced to look after and supply me myself. I was just another victim of war, a homeless child with no idea how to continue. I had to search trashcans for food and I a had to beg but no one gave me something..

Flashbacks from small Nagato who fights for surviving.

During that time I met Yahiko and later on Konan. Together we growed to a small group of unpartable friends and were much better in find food. We stole from people if we could and somehow survived. This was a hard time

Flashbacks of small Yahiko, Nagato and Konan how the go through this.

until we tried to steal from Jiraya. Instead of the other people who dislodged us he willingly shared his food with us. After we finished he told us how bad war is but that it sometimes is inevitable with our current ninja-system. This was near the end of the second Ninja war and the frontlines moved to out of our region. Then he made all three of us to his students and teached us ways to make it easier to survive. He was like a caring father to us and this was the most enjoyable time we had.

Flashback of the time with Jiraya part 1.

Panel with Naruto who things same as by me and says and what happened then to your friend?

Later after we were very good shinobies for our young age he said that he must leave now to aid his comerades in the final battle near the Whirlpool Country to end this war and we wanted to assist him. He said we were to young to fight in a war and we shall rebuild as much as possible of our country. It was sad but he convinced us to do so.
Naruto 445 | Naruto 445 Spoiler

posts.title: ### F1 2009 POST OFICIAL ### Kimi Räikkönen abandona la F1 (por ahora).
posts.content:
Por cierto, ahora que hablais de Kimi me he acordado... un detalle por parte del calvo que segun él, a Kimi no le apetecia correr y fue el primero en salir de la parrilla y abandonar, y siguio rajando que si la actitud del finlandes, que hay que seguir en pista, etc

 

Si se relanzaba la carrera iban a dar otras dos vueltas como mucho, estaba ultimo gracias a la genial estrategia de Ferrari, la pista era una piscina y para colmo el KERS de nuevo dijo basta (un detalle que al calvo, parece que se le paso por alto)

 

Yo estoy convencido de que si este año Ferrari le pone algo con que competir, el año que viene, de nuevo sera el piloto Nº 1 de la escuderia. No hablo de si ganara o no el mundial, pero a Massa le va a poner las pilas

 

Desde pretemporada ha dicho que le gustan los cambios y que va a gusto con el coche y Kimi no necesita mas para ir rapido

 

Kimi sigue siendo el piloto con mas talento de la parrilla

 

Aun queda mucho camino, la reunion de los difusores pendiente, solo se han realizado dos carreras y una de ellas era una autentica loteria,...

 

Pueden pasar muchas cosas en un plazo de un mes, veremos el rumbo que coge todo esto

 

Y yo no se que le veis al helado, como si fuera un bicho raro o asi... el calor tenia que ser bochornoso, sales de un coche que parece un horno, bebes liquido y luego te refrescas un poco tomandote uno, que por mucho que lloviera, dudo que bajaran las temperaturas

 

Como si Alonso no hubiera comido nunca uno

 

Hombre, lo del heladito y tal no tendría ninguna importancia sino fuera porque todos los demás pilotos, incluido Massa y todos los que estaban fuera de los puntos como él, estaban todavía en el muro o en la pista, mojados hasta las trancas, por si se reiniciaba la carrera.

 

Y lo de que Kimi es el piloto con más talento de la parrilla, pues no. Tal vez lo fue, pero ahora mismo Vettel, por poner un ejemplo, le da unas cuantas vueltas. Y de su profesionalidad mejor no hablamos, porque en eso creo que hay 19 pilotos mejores que él.

Lo normal es que nos sorprendiera con una técnica del Tercero, no del 4º, ESTO ES RIDICULO, kishimoto es un adicto a los estupefacientes...

 

La tecnica tenia que ser una de Naruto.

 

En todo caso, y aun sin ver el capitulo, me imagino que realizara el Rasenga, sorprendera a Pain, lo lanzara lejos, veremos unas frases tipo "se nota que es le nieto del Hokage", y aparecera de nuevo Pain para patearlo algunas veces antes de que lo salve alguien como Gai.

 

¿Porqué de Naruto si no se han visto casi en 3 años?, el propio Naruto ha aprendido técnicas de su padre, lo lógico sería que Konohamaru aprenda técnicas de su abuelo. Es algo que ocurre con todos los clanes, Sasuke, Kiba, Shino, Neji y Hinata, todos aprenden las técnicas que usan sus parientes.

Es que tener en Konohamaru un Naruto pequeñito, como que no me llama mucho.

 

Puedo estar equivocado, porque realmente solo es un cuadro, pero en un momento Konohamaru recuerda que Naruto le "enseña" una tecnica.
